name: Wacky Races [Prototype]
description:
This is a Prototype for a racing game based of the show Wacky Races, an old show that came out in 1968 that showcased different members of the Hannah Barbara Universe racing each other in a cross over event.

What this prototype offers?

It currently only has one playable character (Dick Dastardly's Mean Machine), and one enemy character (just a reskin of the first one).

If you get to far ahead of your opponent he will start throwing bananas at you.

there currently isn't an end yet and is seemingly infinite.

Sorry I couldn't get it done, this project most likely won't continue after this.  Due to some unfortunate circumstances, I didn't get to finish the game so this is what we got.
